attributes.action: Give £5000 grants towards Solar and Thermal panels for home generation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The ability for an individual to request and receive £5000 towards the cost of the total installation of either Solar or Thermal panels or both to enable all to reduce both CO2 emmissions and reduce demand on present power stations. Solar and Thermal panels are a renewable energy alternative and would help reduce this countries reliance on imported products and more expensive future solutions.
